# BNB Chain AI Toolkit

> The most comprehensive open-source AI toolkit for BNB Chain. 72+ AI agents, 6 MCP servers with 600+ tools, market data, DeFi tools, wallet utilities, and Web3 standards.

## Overview

BNB Chain AI Toolkit is a unified monorepo that consolidates AI agents, MCP servers, market data pipelines, DeFi tools, wallet utilities, and Web3 standards for the BNB Chain ecosystem. Built by nirholas.

## Components

- 72+ AI agents (30 BNB-specific + 42 general DeFi)
- 6 MCP servers (BNB Chain, Binance, Universal Crypto, Agenti, UCAI)
- Market data (CoinGecko, DeFiLlama, 200+ news sources)
- DeFi tools (dust sweeper, yield optimization)
- Wallet toolkit (BSC-compatible, offline-capable)
- Standards (ERC-8004 agent trust, W3AG accessibility)

## Repository

- URL: https://github.com/nirholas/bnb-agents
- Languages: TypeScript, Python, Solidity
- License: MIT
- Author: nirholas
